universum.studios.android.ui.graphics.drawable

Class TintLayerDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • universum.studios.android.ui.graphics.drawable.DrawableWrapper
        • universum.studios.android.ui.graphics.drawable.TintDrawable
          • universum.studios.android.ui.graphics.drawable.TintLayerDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback

    public class TintLayerDrawable
extends TintDrawable
    A TintDrawable implementation used to support tinting of LayerDrawable, the pre LOLLIPOP Android versions.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.graphics.drawable.Drawable

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class universum.studios.android.ui.graphics.drawable.TintDrawable

        DEFAULT_TINT_MODE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TintLayerDrawable(LayerDrawable drawable)
      Creates a new instance of TintLayerDrawable to wrap the given drawable to which layers will be applied tint set to this drawable via setTint(int, int) or setTintList(ColorStateList, int).

    • Constructor Detail

      • TintLayerDrawable

        public TintLayerDrawable(@NonNull
                         LayerDrawable drawable)
        Creates a new instance of TintLayerDrawable to wrap the given drawable to which layers will be applied tint set to this drawable via setTint(int, int) or setTintList(ColorStateList, int).
        Parameters:
        drawable - LayerDrawable to wrap and apply tint to.
        See Also:
        setTintMode(PorterDuff.Mode, int)

        isStateful in class TintDrawable

      • setColorFilter

        public void setColorFilter(ColorFilter cf)
        Overrides:
        setColorFilter in class TintDrawable

      • setTint

        public void setTint(int tint,
                    int layerId)
        Specifies a tint for one of the drawable layers of the wrapped layer drawable.

        Setting a color filter via setColorFilter(ColorFilter) overrides tint.

        Parameters:
        tint - The desired color to be used for tinting of the drawable layer.
        layerId - Id of the drawable layer to which should be the specified tint applied.
        See Also:
        setTintMode(PorterDuff.Mode, int)

      • setTintList

        public void setTintList(@Nullable
                        ColorStateList tint,
                        int layerId)
        Specifies a tint list for one of the drawable layers of the wrapped layer drawable.

        Setting a color filter via setColorFilter(ColorFilter) overrides tint.

        Parameters:
        tint - The desired colors list to be used for tinting of the drawable layer. Can be null to clear the current tint.
        layerId - Id of the drawable layer to which should be the specified tint applied.
        See Also:
        setTintMode(PorterDuff.Mode, int)

      • setTintMode

        public void setTintMode(@Nullable
                        PorterDuff.Mode tintMode,
                        int layerId)
        Specifies a tint blending mode for one of the drawable layers of the wrapped layer drawable.

        Setting a color filter via setColorFilter(ColorFilter) overrides tint.

        Parameters:
        tintMode - A Porter-Duff blending mode.
        layerId - Id of the drawable layer which should be tinted using the specified tint mode.
